itunes:title: What I Wish My Clients Knew
title: What I Wish My Clients Knew
description: As stylists, we all have different training, diverse client bases, and encounter so many things in the salon on a day-to-day basis. But lately, we've been talking about the things we wish our clients knew that would make our jobs as hair stylists a little easier. Asking us to bend the rules or just understanding how much energy we put into each client would go a long way. Stew and Jessi each picked the 3 things they wish their clients knew before sitting down in their chair!

Stew and Jessi each picked the 3 things they wish their clients knew before sitting down in their chair!
itunes:author: JZ Styles
